title: client just kicked me out of a game and wont let me relog
body: So i was about to start a ranked match with some friends when my game kicked me from the client, no big deal its happened once or twice before ever since the new client came out, but most of the time it lets me reconnect. This time it didn't and now it doesn't even let me relog into league it tells me its the wrong password, so i changed it but it still wont let me in and now i have a leaver buster and lost my LP. Anything you can do for me?

replies.body: Same thing JUST happened to me. Now I'm penalized for a leaver buster, hopefully you didn't get that as well.

Thaaaaaat's pretty odd that you could sign into our support site just fine without being able to sign back into the game. I can't do a whole lot about leaverbusters or LP, but we should try to figure out why you were kicked from the game in the first place. Let's first make sure to double check your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure something didn't go wrong there. 

About not being able to sign back into the client, I know it sounds weird but I want to make sure you tried exiting the client and reloading it first. Hit me back up and let me know if you still can't get logged in.

I had the same thing happen to me. I couldn't connect to the game, then restarted league and there you go. I got "we have restored an older version of lol" and says that my password is incorrect, even though it isn't. I saw a many similar posts about this too.

this just happened to me, and I know it happened to my friend in a normal game.

yeah i went through everything. there is nothing wrong with my pc or my network connection. it is the client because others are having the same issue. i had to completely uninstall and redownload for it to let me relog

The same thing happened to me! I got kicked from the loading screen of my game (literally the last game of my promos), and I cannot get back into the client now for an "incorrect password". I clicked a link to reset my password, and I entered a new password, to which it responded "cannot use old password", but to log into League it tells me that password is incorrect....lol. I still have not been able to log back into the client...
same here, actually tilted, honestly riot should not release such a bugged client
